title: Didnt get LP for win
body: Hey, i won ranked game a while ago scoreboard after the game lagged so i jus skipped and it seems i didnt get any LP for that i tried relog alsoe played another game like 2h after that one and i get -LP reloged again but still without those wich i was supposed to recive ... what can i do ?

replies.body: It looks like EUNE is still having this weird visual bug. I still haven't gotten any word on when this might be fixed, but AFAIK you're still getting the LP. The client just isn't showing it for some reason. Be sure to [**check the status page for updates**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune)!
